 9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_MEMORY_POOL_HPP
10#define VSIP_CORE_MEMORY_POOL_HPP

12/***********************************************************************

15
16#include <limits>
17#include <cstdlib>
18#include <stdexcept>
19#include <vsip/support.hpp>
20#include <vsip/core/profile.hpp>
21
22
23/***********************************************************************
24  Declarations
25***********************************************************************/
26
27namespace vsip
28{
29
30namespace impl 
31{
32
33/// Memory_pool base class.
34
35class Memory_pool
36{
37public:
38  Memory_pool() {}
39  virtual ~Memory_pool();
40
41  virtual void* impl_allocate(size_t size) = 0;
42  virtual void  impl_deallocate(void* ptr, size_t size) = 0;
43
44  virtual char const* name() = 0;
45
46  // Convenience functions
47  template <typename T>
48  T* allocate(length_type size)
49  {
50    using namespace vsip::impl::profile;
51    event<memory>("Memory_pool::allocate", size * sizeof(T));
52    return (T*)(impl_allocate(size * sizeof(T)));
53  }
54
55  template <typename T>
56  void deallocate(T *ptr, length_type size)
57  {
58    using namespace vsip::impl::profile;
59    event<memory>("Memory_pool::deallocate", size * sizeof(T));
60    impl_deallocate(ptr, size * sizeof(T));
61  }
62};
63
64
65extern Memory_pool* default_pool;
66
67void initialize_default_pool(int& argc, char**&argv);
68
69void finalize_default_pool();
70
71
72} // namespace vsip::impl
73
74} // namespace vsip
75
76#endif // VSIP_CORE_POOL_HPP
